content:
At the end of April, I have submitted an entry to the AFP. I didn't receive any information about it since. Is a delay like this to be expected? My previous entry took much less time, but perhaps the circumstances were different.

And to be clear, the build server page does indicate that " The AFP editors have been notified of your submission. "
Well, it does happen occasionally, but it shouldn't. It's still marked as "pending" in our system, so it's not like we lost track of it. I'll try to look at it tomorrow, or later this week.
Ah, good to know. It's nowhere near urgent, so don't feel rushed :D
